item.description:
@system wrote:

i got same problem!
(whit sinisterscape compiler)

try this:

@echo off COLOR 09 title Compiler "C:\Program\Java\bin\javac.exe" -cp .../Bin *.java pause

item.title: Help with Compiler
item.dc:creator: @thepker13 thepker13
item.description:
@thepker13 wrote:

Ok i tried to run the compiler but it didnt work. I have Jdk1.5.0_17 but it still doesnt work! Here is the compiler code.

@echo off
echo SinisterScape ownz
title SiniserScape Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java\Jdk1.5.0_17”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Please Help me

Read full topic
